ProdtAttrScope.name: ProdtAttrScope
ProdtAttrScope.description: Represents the scope definition for a product attribute so that it can be used during claims processing.

ApplicableActions.description: Specifies the action type that initiates the attribute processing.

Category.description: Specifies the processing category of the associated attribute.

DurationType.description: Specifies the duration type over which the attribute consumption is actively monitored during claims processing.

DurationUnit.description: Specifies the unit of measure for the duration value.

DurationValue.description: The duration when the duration type is set to Rolling Time Period.

ItemType.description: Specifies the item type for the attribute processing.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: Name of the product attribute scope record.

Scope.description: Specifies the scope for tracking the associated attribute.

UsageType.description: Specifies the usage of the associated attribute.
